name: Tentacles & Eyeballs Card 3
description:
This ACEO or ATC is based on an idea of creatures from another dimension, another reality whose physical structure is made up of large eyes and tentacles of some sort. The art is done on a 2.5”x3.5” 140lb watercolor paper (300 g/m) with pen & permanent ink. This card is done in a mixture of line art and pointillism, which is the use of making patterns with dots or dashes in various densities.

The artist signature will be on the back of the card.

You are purchasing the physical card only. Artist retains all copyrights for this creation.

Thank you for checking out my items, it is much appreciated.


-Rob

Looking for more of my work check out 

Website: http://www.RobsDigitalArt.com
About Me: http://about.me/RobsDigitalArt
